name: Magic Rat
description:
—Magic Rat—

| Finnish College Jam #4 |

_______________________________________________________________________

The Rat has only one mission: to destroy all the magic crystals that evil robot bees are protecting. Shoot your way to the crystals and upgrade your magic to defeat even more powerful enemies.
And in the end, deactivate the big crystal and defeat the evil robot bees.

_______________________________________________________________________


How to play

Move by using WASD-buttons and shoot by using a mouse. Click on the chosen upgrade to activate it. You can upgrade your bullets firerate, -damage and -size. You can get more health by walking over a health pack.

_______________


Credits

Code/Unity: Eemeli Pärnänen
Graphics: Katri Tempakka
